targets.query:
from(bucket: "${buckets}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "geth.chain/head/block.gauge")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${buckets}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "geth.chain/execution.timer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "mean")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${buckets}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "geth.chain/inserts.timer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "mean")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${buckets}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "geth.arthera/chaindata/main/disk/read.meter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "mean")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${buckets}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "geth.arthera/chaindata/main/disk/write.meter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "mean")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${buckets}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "geth.arthera/chaindata/evm-logs/disk/read.meter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "mean")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${buckets}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "geth.arthera/chaindata/evm-logs/disk/write.meter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "mean")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${buckets}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "geth.arthera/chaindata/evm-data/disk/read.meter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "mean")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${buckets}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "geth.arthera/chaindata/evm-data/disk/write.meter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "mean")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${buckets}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "geth.p2p/peers.gauge")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${buckets}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "geth.p2p/dials.meter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${buckets}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "geth.p2p/serves.meter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${buckets}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "geth.p2p/egress.meter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "mean")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${buckets}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "geth.p2p/ingress.meter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "mean")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${buckets}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "geth.rpc/duration/eth_sendRawTransaction/success.timer" or r["_measurement"] == "geth.rpc/duration/eth_getTransactionReceipt/success.timer" or r["_measurement"] == "geth.rpc/duration/eth_getTransactionCount/success.timer" or r["_measurement"] == "geth.rpc/duration/eth_getTransactionByHash/success.timer" or r["_measurement"] == "geth.rpc/duration/eth_getBlockByNumber/success.timer" or r["_measurement"] == "geth.rpc/duration/eth_getBalance/success.timer" or r["_measurement"] == "geth.rpc/duration/eth_feeHistory/success.timer" or r["_measurement"] == "geth.rpc/duration/eth_estimateGas/success.timer" or r["_measurement"] == "geth.rpc/duration/eth_gasPrice/success.timer" or r["_measurement"] == "geth.rpc/duration/eth_chainId/success.timer" or r["_measurement"] == "geth.rpc/duration/eth_blockNumber/success.timer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "mean" or r["_field"] == "max")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${buckets}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "geth.rpc/requests.gauge")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${buckets}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "geth.rpc/success.gauge")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${buckets}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "geth.rpc/failure.gauge")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${buckets}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "geth.system/disk/writebytes.count")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${buckets}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "geth.system/disk/readbytes.count")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${buckets}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "geth.system/cpu/procload.gauge")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${buckets}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "geth.system/memory/used.gauge")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

list.definition:
import "strings"

buckets()
  |> rename(columns: {"name": "_value"})
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> filter(fn: (r) => strings.hasPrefix(v: r._value, prefix: "_") == false and r._value != "arthera")
list.label: Choose Validator
list.name: buckets
list.query:
import "strings"

buckets()
  |> rename(columns: {"name": "_value"})
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> filter(fn: (r) => strings.hasPrefix(v: r._value, prefix: "_") == false and r._value != "arthera")
